
### URLs and HTTP (1)  {.smaller}



* <code>http://www.foo.com:80/foo/bar?quux[#q1]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only}</code>
* lookup IP address of www.foo.com
* connect via TCP to port 80:
  
<pre><code>GET /foo/bar?quux HTTP/1.1
Host: \\emphThree{www.foo.com:80}
</code></pre>
 

* exercise: why include the Host there?
